title: Chapter 99
body:
Chapter 99

Chapter 99


Soon after they got together, Ming Xiaoyu asked Xi Ze how tall he was.


At that time, Xi Ze’s answer was that he should be more than 190cm. Ming Xiaoyu, “?＿?” Due to this expression, XI Ze was forced to measure his height…


Well.


Later, Ming Xiaoyu said it never happened!


Now, the clothing that Xi Ze pulled out was a little short compared to his height.


It was a simple and elegant suit. The fabric was camel hair dyed a light black and was dotted with a starry pattern that reflected the light of the Milky Way.


Camel hair was a very expensive type of high-grade fabric. Usually, only a small portion of the fluff around the camel’s belly was taken, making it extremely precious. In general, soft and fluffy camel hair would be used to make haute couture coats. This time, it was actually used in a man’s suit, making Ming Xiaoyu feel surprised.


“This material has been treated very well. If I don’t observe it carefully, it wouldn’t be obvious that it is camel hair.”


Ming Yu carefully observed the suit while speaking. Ming Yu’s surprise wasn’t because this suit was made of camel hair. After all, camel hair had always been an important raw material for men’s high-end shows. He was really surprised that the tailors who handled this suit was superb. They treated the fluffy nature of the camel hair, making it elegant.


After a moment of careful observation, Ming Yu couldn’t help saying, “This suit seems a bit small.”


Yes, the design of the suit was very good. The lines were smooth and it was more like a traditional British suit. But even if there were a thousand good things, there was one bad thing. The size of this suit was wrong!


Ming Yu’s eyesight was good. He could tell with one glance that the person wearing this clothing was probably between 178~188cm in height. The proportions of the top and bottom were very good, showing off the tailoring. But even if the height was good enough to meet requirements, the design of the waist and hips was too strange.


Xi Ze heard the youth’s words and asked with a smile, “How is the size small?”


Ming Xiaoyu replied, “This suit, a normal man can’t wear it. Is this really a men’s suit?”


Xi Ze stared at the youth for a long time before gently shaking his head. “This is women’s clothing.”


Ming Xiaoyu understood with these words.


Who said that a woman couldn’t wear a suit? Don’t you know about the popular ‘boyfriend fans’ right now?


A few years ago, in the entertainment industry, there were many actresses who wore men’s clothing and became ‘national boyfriends’ and ‘national husbands.’ The women showed a bold and heroic atmosphere, causing the hearts of female fans to flutter and feel confused.


However, why would Xi Ze show him this woman’s suit…?


As if aware of the youth’s confusion, Xi Ze hung the suit on a hanger and explained, “This suit isn’t Garcia’s work. It is my design.” Ming Yu looked at Xi Ze in amazement and the other said calmly, “I designed this suit last year. Ji and Ya is inferior to Garcia when it comes to the production of men’s clothing, so I commissioned Clucas to help me with this suit.”


Ming Yu understood Xi Ze’s explanation but he also realized something, “You designed a female suit?” Ming Xiaoyu asked again, “Who is this outfit for? This figure is very good, it is very beautiful and detailed. You don’t like inconvenient things and she even let you tailor a suit for her. It is really rare.”


Xi Ze carefully gazed at the youth for a long time. Ming Xiaoyu’s lips were curved in a gentle smile, his eyebrows slightly raised. It was an indifferent appearance, without any abnormalities.


However, Xi Ze’s lips slowly curved and he casually replied, “This suit is designed for Chaoman.”


The curves of Ming Xiaoyu’s lips lowered for a moment before he returned to normal in the blink of an eye. He kept smiling as he asked, “He Chaoman? You really put in a lot of thought. This suit is very well designed and beautiful. He Chaoman will definitely looked good in it.”


The man’s dark eyes stared at the youth’s face for a long time. Then Xi Ze smiled and asked, “Are you jealous?”


Ming Xiaoyu was stunned. “Jealous?”


Xi Ze raised an eyebrow. “Yes, you are jealous.”


Ming Xiaoyu spread out his hands. “Mr. Xi, you must design dozens or even hundreds of high-end clothing for women every year. How can I be jealous of this suit? You are really thinking too much.”


Xi Ze’s lips curved quietly. Ah, he really was jealous.


Xi Ze expected this youth to have a little taste, but never thought that once this small mushroom ate vinegar, he wouldn’t recover for a full three or four days!


When Xi Ze talked to him, he was still normal. They would do some intimate actions and he wouldn’t refuse.


But there was something wrong!


The small mushroom always seemed to have a hidden sword when they were talking. And when they were intimate, the small mushroom was a little absent-minded.


This was Xi Ze. Someone else might’ve died long ago. But Xi Ze was quite happy. He liked seeing his small mushroom be jealous.


Ming Yu’s words weren’t wrong. Every year, Xi Ze designed hundreds of high-end female clothing and even a lot of men’s clothing. To be jealous of everyone, Ming Xiaoyu’s vinegar would be larger than the Pacific Ocean!


But this time, it was really different.


Ming Yu hadn’t met He Chaoman once since he came to this world. He only saw her from far away in the company.


He knew that she was the world’s 2nd ranked female model and that she had outstanding strength. When he saw her from far away in the company, Ming Xiaoyu was aware that this female model had an elegant temperament, a beautiful appearance and a unique aura around her.


Ming Yu thought that the reason why He Chaoman was ranked below Cecilia wasn’t a matter of strength. It was only because the people of the world preferred Cecilia’s clean and angelic type of temperament. This was the only place where Cecilia was better than He Chaoman.


At the same time, Ming Yu also knew that He Chaoman was able to rise to fame because of Xi Ze.


He Chaoman was just starting her career when she walked in Ji and Ya’s high end fashion show. After Xi Ze picked her for three consecutive fashion shows, she entered the world’s female top 10 supermodel rankings and then entered the top 3 within six months.


Ming Xiaoyu thought of this and couldn’t help feeling: （/=＿=）/～┴┴!!!


He was jealous! Was he not allowed to be jealous?


No matter how mature, clever and deep he was, he couldn’t feel good if his lover designed clothing for a woman and helped her rise to fame. Now he designed a suit specifically for her and spent half a year making it! How was this good?


Who wouldn’t be angry!! Ming Xiaoyu was going to die from an excess of anger!!!


…However, these bitter words were kept inside the small mushroom’s heart.


He suppressed it until the night before his return to Huaxia. Clucas and his girlfriend took Xi Ze and Ming Yu out to eat, where it finally broke. It was like a punctured balloon and couldn’t be stopped.


At the dinner, Clucas said without much thought, “Ah, that suit is finished so you can take it away. When you gave me the design last year, it was really tricky. It took me a lot of effort to make and wasn’t easy.”


Ming XIaoyu beside him, “^_^ #”


Clucas continued, “I believe that He will certainly produce a unique result when wearing these clothes. As you said, she is the only one who can wear it. Others won’t give off the right feeling.”


Ming Xiaoyu, “…==!!!”


That night, the handsome youth didn’t act strangely. He still talked normally to Clucas, Clucas’ girlfriend and even Xi Ze. On the way home, Ming Xiaoyu didn’t do anything unusual but Xi Ze felt a bit strange.


However, once the two people opened the door and entered the house, Xi Ze was changing his shoes when he heard the youth snort and said, “Chasing after females.”


Xi Ze, “…”


After a moment, Xi Ze helplessly spread his arms. “I only chase my small mushroom.”


Unexpectedly, the young man didn’t even bother refuting the ‘small mushroom’. He just stared at the man.


The clear moonlight shone through the windows of the living room, casting a silvery snow on the floor. The youth’s clear eyes were like crystal amber at this moment, making Xi Ze sucked in. He felt his heartbeat slowly accelerating.


The light was too dim, making it impossible for Xi Ze to see the youth’s facial features. However, the youth’s face had already been deeply imprinted in Xi Ze’s heart. Even if he closed his eyes, he could describe it clearly.


The two people stared at each other for a moment. Then XI Ze sighed and decided not to tease the other person any long. “You are misunderstanding. In fact, He Chaoman is my…eh…”


The youth suddenly reached out and dragged the man’s down.


Ming Yu’s arms tightly embraced Xi Ze’s neck, yanking his hand down and kissing the man fiercely on the lips. The kiss was too sudden and intense. Xi Ze didn’t have a chance to respond as the youth sucked at his lips madly.


An ambiguous sound spread in the quiet entryway. Xi Ze slowly closed his eyes and held the youth’s waist, directly capturing control. He pressed the youth against the wall and kissed with all his strength.


But this time, Ming Yu didn’t want to follow the man’s wishes. He used his strength and pressed Xi Ze against the wall instead. As Xi Ze made a surprised look, the youth stared at him with defiant eyes before once again kissing the man passionately.


…So active? Not bad.


Xi Ze was enjoying the youth’s initiative when he was awakened by a pain from his lips.


In the cool moonlight, the youth’s white skin was glowing, his eyes were shining and his plump lips were a bright red colour. Xi Ze’s heart beat faster and he was in shock from the beautiful scenery, causing him to forget the stinging feeling of his lip being bitten for a moment.


At this time, the youth’s eyes narrowed dangerously and he sneered, “Xi Ze, you have to be aware of who you are.”
